moves.1. e4 e5 2. Nf3 Nc6 3. c3: I try out a new idea.
moves.3... d5: Of course. Black has to break up white's center before it is too late.
moves.4. exd5 Qxd5 5. d4: An inaccuracy. c4 might have been better.
moves.6. Be3: I consent to having my pawns scrambled.
moves.13. g3: I set a little but venomous trap.
moves.13... Qxh3: Oops! the queen is a goner.
moves.14. Bg4+: He resigned. After ...Qxg4, Qxg4+ Rd7, Qxg7 black wouldn't stand a chance after losing another rook.

gameName: Luring her majesty a little too far...
